message.body: Howdy! Would you like bars and tone and a slate? Or is a straight output ok? (I imagine straight is the way to go, correct?)

Hi bud. Looks like the source file provided is 24fps. We need a 23.98 for the layback to tape.
We can do the conversion in house but I worry a bit about audio drift. Is it at all possible for you to drop off a 23.98 file tomorrow? If not we can work something out.
Oh no! I'll look at the sequence tonight and see what's . If I can change that easily, I'll def bring by around lunchtime tmw.
Thx bud. Should be relatively easy fix. keep an eye out for audio drift.
Will do. I'll look for the sync.
Of course! Sorry we can't just take care of it. file format conversion is an added cost, blah blah blah.
No I appreciate that. Shoestring budget:)
Hi! I should be there in the next 30 minutes!
